data.name: ReadCsePersonAddress
data.value: select T1.IDENTIFIER, T1.CSP_NUMBER, T1.VERIFIED_DATE, T1.END_DATE, T1.CREATED_TIMESTAMP from CKT_CSE_PERS_ADDR T1 with(readuncommitted) where T1.CREATED_TIMESTAMP <= @createdTimestamp and T1.END_DATE >= @endDate and exists ( select * from CKT_CSE_PERSON T2 with(readuncommitted) join CKT_CASE_ROLE T3 with(readuncommitted) on T2.NUMB = T3.CSP_NUMBER and T3.TYPE = 'AP' and T3.START_DATE <= @endDate and T3.END_DATE >= @endDate and T3.CAS_NUMBER = @casNumber where T2.NUMB = T1.CSP_NUMBER ) order by T1.VERIFIED_DATE desc

data.name: ReadDashboardStagingPriority4
data.value: select REPORT_MONTH, RUN_NUMBER, CASE_NUMBER, AS_OF_DATE, CURRENT_CS_IND, OTHER_OBG_IND, PAYING_CASE_IND, ADDRESS_VER_IND, EMPLOYER_VER_IND from CKT_DB_STAGE_PRI_4 where RUN_NUMBER = @runNumber and REPORT_MONTH = cast(@reportMonth as integer) and CASE_NUMBER > @caseNumber

data.name: ReadIncomeSource
data.value: select T1.IDENTIFIER, T1.TYPE, T1.RETURN_DT, T1.RETURN_CD, T1.CREATED_TIMESTAMP, T1.CSP_I_NUMBER, T1.START_DT, T1.END_DT from CKT_INCOME_SOURCE T1 with(readuncommitted) where (T1.TYPE in ('E', 'M', 'O')) and T1.CREATED_TIMESTAMP <= @createdTimestamp and T1.END_DT >= @endDt and exists ( select * from CKT_CSE_PERSON T2 with(readuncommitted) join CKT_CASE_ROLE T3 with(readuncommitted) on T2.NUMB = T3.CSP_NUMBER and T3.TYPE = 'AP' and T3.START_DATE <= @endDt and T3.END_DATE >= @endDt and T3.CAS_NUMBER = @casNumber where T2.NUMB = T1.CSP_I_NUMBER ) order by T1.RETURN_DT desc

data.name: UpdateDashboardStagingPriority4
data.value: update CKT_DB_STAGE_PRI_4 set ADDRESS_VER_IND = @addressVerInd, EMPLOYER_VER_IND = @employerVerInd where REPORT_MONTH = @reportMonth and RUN_NUMBER = @runNumber and CASE_NUMBER = @caseNumber
